name: Super Speed Car
details: A high-speed pull-back car made with durable plastic, perfect for racing fun on smooth surfaces.

name: Turbo Racer
details: A colorful, friction-powered toy car designed for indoor races. Easy for kids to grip and drive.

name: Lightning Drift Car
details: Sleek design with drift wheels and LED lights. Encourages imaginative play and motor skills.

name: Off-Road Car
details: A rugged vehicle with large wheels for bumpy surfaces. Ideal for adventurous outdoor play.

name: Electric Race Track
details: Comes with motorized cars and a looped track. Great for competitive racing with friends.

name: Robot Flash Car
details: Transforms between a robot and car with flashing lights and sounds. A fun 2-in-1 toy.

name: Electric Train Set
details: Includes engine, tracks, and accessories. Runs on batteries and encourages problem-solving.

name: Flying Disc Drone
details: Hand-controlled flying disc drone with sensors. Safe for indoor play and tons of fun.

name: Building Blocks
details: Colorful plastic building blocks that help children develop creativity and coordination.

name: Kitchen Set
details: Miniature kitchen playset with utensils, stove, and accessories. Encourages role play.

name: Toolbox Play Kit
details: Includes plastic hammer, wrench, and screws. Perfect for curious little builders.

name: Toy Fruit Set
details: A fun toy fruit set made of safe plastic. Teaches kids about healthy food through pretend play.

name: Transformer Robot
details: Easily transforms between robot and vehicle. Perfect for action-packed stories and battles.

name: Battle Robot
details: Interactive robot with lights, sounds, and moving parts. Boosts STEM learning and fun.

name: Mini AI Robot
details: Smart robot with voice command, gestures, and dancing modes. A perfect tech toy for kids.
